AT.name: Ninja Gaiden III™: The Ancient Ship of Doom
AT.description: Die ursprünglichen NES™-Abenteuer von Ryu Hayabusa kommen in Ninja Gaiden III: The Ancient Ship of Doom zum Ende. Ryu wird fälschlicherweise des Mordes beschuldigt und muss sich durch sieben aktionsgeladene Stufen kämpfen, um seinen Namen reinzuwaschen. Ausgerüstet mit seinem zuverlässigen Schwert und Ninja-Magie kann Ryu jetzt auch Plattformen und Rohre greifen, um seine Gegner von oben oder von unten rasch anzugreifen. Du wirst alle von Ryus' Kräften, die dir zur Verfügung stehen, brauchen, um die Mächte des Bösen zu besiegen und den wahren Schuldigen aufzudecken. Hierbei handelt es sich um die US-Version des Spiels.

movies.name: Ninja Gaiden III™: The Ancient Ship of Doom: Video

AU.name: Ninja Gaiden III™: The Ancient Ship of Doom
AU.description: The original NES™ adventures of Ryu Hayabusa conclude with Ninja Gaiden III: The Ancient Ship of Doom. Falsely accused of murder, Ryu must battle through seven action-packed stages to clear his name. Armed with his trusty sword and ninja magic, Ryu can now also grab platforms and pipes to perform swift attacks on enemies from above or below. You’ll need all of Ryu’s skills at your disposal to defeat the forces of evil and uncover the true culprit. This is the US version of the game.

movies.name: Ninja Gaiden III™: The Ancient Ship of Doom: Video

BG.name: Ninja Gaiden III™: The Ancient Ship of Doom
BG.description: The original NES™ adventures of Ryu Hayabusa conclude with Ninja Gaiden III: The Ancient Ship of Doom. You’ll need all of Ryu’s skills at your disposal to defeat the forces of evil and uncover the true culprit. This is the US version of the game.

BE.name: Ninja Gaiden III™: The Ancient Ship of Doom
BE.description: Les aventures originales de Ryu Hayabusa sur NES™ se terminent sur Ninja Gaiden III: The Ancient Ship of Doom. Accusé à tord d'un meurtre qu'il n'a pas commis, Ryu doit combattre à travers sept niveaux frénétiques pour laver son honneur. Armé de sa fidèle épée et de ses pouvoirs de ninja, Ryu peut maintenant s'accrocher aux plateformes et aux tuyaux pour effectuer des attaques fulgurantes sur les ennemis se trouvant au-dessus ou au-dessous de lui. Vous aurez besoin de toutes les aptitudes de Ryu mises à votre disposition pour vaincre les forces du mal et découvrir l'identité du véritable coupable. Ceci est la version américaine du jeu.

movies.name: Ninja Gaiden III™: The Ancient Ship of Doom : vidéo

ES.name: Ninja Gaiden III™: The Ancient Ship of Doom
ES.description: Las aventuras originales de Ryu Hayabusa para NES™ llegan a su fin con Ninja Gaiden III: The Ancient Ship of Doom. Acusado injustamente de asesinato, Ryu debe combatir a lo largo de siete niveles llenos de acción para limpiar su nombre. Armado con su fiel espada y su magia ninja, ahora Ryu también puede coger plataformas y tuberías para atacar rápidamente a sus enemigos desde arriba o abajo. Necesitarás todas las habilidades de Ryu para derrotar a las fuerzas del mal y descubrir al verdadero culpable. Esta es la versión estadounidense del juego

IT.name: Ninja Gaiden III™: The Ancient Ship of Doom
IT.description: Ninja Gaiden III: The Ancient Ship of Doom è il capitolo conclusivo dell'avventura originale per NES™ che segue le gesta di Ryu Hayabusa. Ingiustamente accusato di omicidio, Ryu dovrà superare sette livelli ricchi d'azione per scagionarsi dalle accuse. Armato della sua fedele spada e con l'aiuto della magia ninja, Ryu può ora sfruttare piattaforme e tubature per attaccare furtivamente i nemici dall'alto o dal basso. Sfrutta al massimo tutte le abilità di Ryu per sconfiggere le forze del male e scovare il vero colpevole. Questa è la versione americana del gioco.

movies.name: Ninja Gaiden III™: The Ancient Ship of Doom: video

movies.name: Ninja Gaiden III™: The Ancient Ship of Doom: Video

NL.name: Ninja Gaiden III™: The Ancient Ship of Doom
NL.description: De oorspronkelijke NES™-avonturen van Ryu Hayabusa komen tot een eind met Ninja Gaiden III: The Ancient Ship of Doom. Ten onrechte beschuldigd van moord moet Ryu zich al vechtend een weg banen door zeven levels die gevuld zijn met actie om zijn onschuld te bewijzen. Gewapend met zijn trouwe zwaard en ninja-magie is Ryu nu ook in staat om platformen en pijpen vast te grijpen om zowel van bovenaf als onderaf snelle aanvallen op vijanden uit te voeren. Je zult alle beschikbare vaardigheden van Ryu nodig hebben om de kwade machten te verslaan en de ware dader te ontmaskeren. Dit is de Amerikaanse versie van het spel.

movies.name: Ninja Gaiden III™: The Ancient Ship of Doom: Video

Falsely accused of murder, Ryu must battle through seven action-packed stages to clear his name. Armed with his trusty sword and ninja magic, Ryu can now also grab platforms and pipes to perform swift attacks on enemies from above or below. You’ll need all of Ryu’s skills at your disposal to defeat the forces of evil and uncover the true culprit. This is the US version of the game.

You’ll need all of Ryu’s skills at your disposal to defeat the forces of evil and uncover the true culprit. This is the US version of the game.

movies.name: Ninja Gaiden III™: The Ancient Ship of Doom: Video

PT.name: Ninja Gaiden III™: The Ancient Ship of Doom
PT.description: As aventuras de Ryu Hayabusa na NES™ chegam à apoteose em Ninja Gaiden III: The Ancient Ship of Doom. Acusado injustamente de homicídio, Ryu terá de lutar em sete níveis repletos de ação para limpar o seu nome. Armado com a sua fiel espada e magia ninja, Ryu pode agora também agarrar-se a plataformas e canos para atacar os inimigos de cima ou por baixo. Precisarás de todas as habilidades do Ryu para derrotar as forças do mal e revelar o verdadeiro culpado. Esta é a versão do jogo para os EUA.

movies.name: Ninja Gaiden III™: The Ancient Ship of Doom: Vídeo

RU.name: Ninja Gaiden III™: The Ancient Ship of Doom
RU.description: Заключительная глава приключений Ryu Hayabusa в игре Ninja Gaiden III: The Ancient Ship of Doom для системы NES™. Ложно осужденному в убийстве, Ryu придется пройти через семь уровней, полных опасных испытаний, на пути к очищению своей репутации. Вооруженный своим верным мечом и магией ниндзя, Ryu также может хвататься за платформы и трубы для того, чтобы неожиданно атаковать своих врагов, как сверху, так и снизу. Для того, чтобы найти истинного преступника и преодолеть силы зла, вам нужно будет использовать все способности Ryu. Эта версия игры предназначена для продажи в США.

movies.name: Ninja Gaiden III™: The Ancient Ship of Doom: видео
